original_text: And changed his prison garments: and he did eat bread continually before him all the days of his life.
korean_text: 그 죄수의 의복을 벗게 하고 그의 일평생에 항상 왕의 앞에서 양식을 먹게 하였고

sentences.original_text: and he did eat bread continually before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 앞에서 계속해서 빵을 먹었으며

sentences.original_text: all the days of his life.
